forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: rotation placeholder

comments.text: i would appreciate a placeholder for detecting the rotation of a shape or thing. constant rotation is tied to framerate so having a placeholder to keep it in check would be nice :]
